channel.title: How do I change the weather
channel.description:
I am just wandering how you change the weather I know theres a weather file but what do I put in it? Also if anyone could list what imput changes what that would be great. Thanks.
**edited 5 mins later**
Um is there a way you can set random weather change like time of day etc? Because there needs to be en easier way to change it.
